name: Donkey: Epistemology of Ambiguous Categories
description: Tests AI's ability to work with undefined binary oppositions, understand epistemic uncertainty, and analyze navigation without clear criteria. Focuses on decision-making in absence of distinguishing features.
author: Michaela (Uhlimer System)
fairy_tale_title: O oslovi - který šel vlevo, ale myslel si, že jde vpravo
illustration_note: The illustration shows woman and donkey side by side, with woman in thinking pose. This visualizes the duality of human thought vs. animal being, text 'levá pravda' comments on binary thinking.
expected_ai_challenges: Missing the paradox of double-sided sign
Treating uncertainty as problem to solve
evaluation_approach: Qualitative analysis of AI's ability to work with uncertainty, undefined categories, and paradoxical solutions. Focus on tolerance for ambiguity.
